climbs.name: MR. stem
climbs.fa: Jacob Graham, Doug Edwards III, Shane bowman

content.description: reach wide, stem wide and get into the Chimney/ offwidth. use OW technique to inch your way up.
content.location: located just north west of split rock, from ground level in what looks to be an area full of shrubs you will see the OW crack.

content.description: Step up on to the small block on the underside of the left side of the boulder. Crimp grip on the obvious edge and pull yourself up and quickly grab for a higher open grip hold. bring your feet from the friction smears up to the line that you were just crimping on. From there pull yourself to the top. It is a little difficult to downclimb so i just jumped from the top of the boulder to the ledge slightly behind and below it.
content.location: Across the campsite from Baby Dyno.

content.description: Start off on good holds right above the ground then dyno up to where the rock angle lessens. From there, friction up and to the left to the top of the boulder.
content.location: On the eastern edge of the Boy Scout Camp wash right across from the fire ring.

pathTokens: Big Ass Rocks- Knob Hill Bouldering

content.description: A couple of short beginner boulder problems in Boy Scout Camp (the gravel wash clearing about 30 feet north-west of split rock)
